Uses of Package
com.codepoetics.fluvius.api

  • Packages that use com.codepoetics.fluvius.api 
    Package Description
    com.codepoetics.fluvius.api
    Provides the top-level Fluvius API.
    com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.compilation
    Interfaces for compilers which compile Flows into a FlowExecutions.
    com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.tracing
    Provides the API for tracing of flow execution.
    com.codepoetics.fluvius.conditions
    Contains classes for working with Conditions.
    com.codepoetics.fluvius.describers
    Defines a FlowVisitor which constructs a FlowDescription from a Flow, and a PrettyPrintingDescriptionWriter which can pretty-print it to a String.
    com.codepoetics.fluvius.execution
    Classes providing flow execution strategies.
    com.codepoetics.fluvius.flows
    Provides the fluent Flow-creation and execution API, for which the public entry-point is the Flows class.
    com.codepoetics.fluvius.history
    Classes relating to the capture, storage and retrieval of Flow execution trace histories.
    com.codepoetics.fluvius.operations
    Provides a utility class for constructing Operations.
    com.codepoetics.fluvius.tracing
    Provides a tracing FlowVisitor implementation which constructs a TracedAction.
    com.codepoetics.fluvius.visitors
    Provides the basic FlowVisitor implementation needed to execute a Flow, together with the Visitors public entry point for obtaining and composing Visitors.
  • Classes in com.codepoetics.fluvius.api used by com.codepoetics.fluvius.api 
    Class and Description
    Condition
    A Condition tests a Scratchpad, returning true or false depending on the Scratchpad's state.
    Conditional
    A value with an attached Condition.
    Flow
    A Flow which takes values from a Scratchpad, and provides a new value to be written into the Scratchpad.
    FlowResultCallback
    A callback which is called when an asynchronously-executed Flow has completed.
    FlowVisitor
    Visits a Flow and all of its sub-flows to construct a value, such as an Action or FlowDescription, which represents something we might want to do with the Flow, e.g.
    Operation
    An Operation accepts a Scratchpad, and returns a value of some type.
  • Classes in com.codepoetics.fluvius.api used by com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.compilation 
    Class and Description
    Flow
    A Flow which takes values from a Scratchpad, and provides a new value to be written into the Scratchpad.
    FlowExecution
    A Flow compiled for execution.
  • Classes in com.codepoetics.fluvius.api used by com.codepoetics.fluvius.api.tracing 
    Class and Description
    Action
    An Action takes a Scratchpad, performs some operation, and returns an updated Scratchpad.
    FlowExecution
    A Flow compiled for execution.
  • Classes in com.codepoetics.fluvius.api used by com.codepoetics.fluvius.conditions 
    Class and Description
    Condition
    A Condition tests a Scratchpad, returning true or false depending on the Scratchpad's state.
